<p style="margin-top:0cm;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:7.5pt;margin-left:0cm;
background:white"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#333333">看到</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#333333">@<a href="http://ourcoders.com/user/name/%E5%B0%8F%E5%9D%8FEric/" target="_blank"><span lang="ZH-CN" style="font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#0088CC;text-decoration:none;
text-underline:none">小坏</span><span style="color:#0088CC;text-decoration:none;
text-underline:none">Eric</span></a> </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
color:#333333">关于国内码工找国外工作的帖子，我来说说美国的情况。这两年从国内毕业直接到湾区工作的国人越来越多，其实这条路的难度远远没有想象中那么大。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#333333"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin-top:0cm;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:7.5pt;margin-left:0cm;
background:white"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#333333">现在湾区招毕业生或工作三年以内的初级工程师，主要就两个条件：算法题和沟通能力。对于一线公司来说，并不需要初级工程师能直接独当一面。他们更希望的是，招来的人被放在任何岗位都能在短时间内适应。所以这些公司招人时不是很看重一些很具体的经验（比如使用某个</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#333333">framework</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#333333">或</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#333333">db</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#333333">），因为他们相信只要足够聪明，这些都是可以在短时间内学习的。所以在招人时，他们会倾向于一些需要智商（在他们看来）的方式，也就是算法题。不过对于国人来说，反正是做题，我们基础教育赖以成名的题海战术正好派上用场。所以现在在美国找工作，准备面试有点像体力活，反正一共就那么多题，除了运气好的和实力爆棚的，大部分人拼的就是做题量的大小。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#333333">LZ</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#333333">如果真想找湾区大公司的工作，可以去</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#333333">mitbbs</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#333333">的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#333333">jobhunting</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#333333">版上看看，里面有大量的真题面经。还有</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#333333">leetcode</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#333333">（题库）和</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#333333">careercup 150</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:
宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
color:#333333">（大纲），拿出准备高考的劲头，问题不大。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#333333"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin-top:0cm;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:7.5pt;margin-left:0cm;
background:white"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#333333">第二看重的是沟通能力，也就是在团队中能和其他人合作的能力。其实这一点在其他行业的面试中非常重要，不过在码工面试时，对这项能力的要求其实是非常低的。因为湾区有大量的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#333333">“</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#333333">外国人</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#333333">”</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#333333">（中国和印度），招聘时不可能要求所有人都像土生土长的老美一样谈笑风生。其实在招聘中，只要你的英语能和面试官相互理解，谈论技术的时候比较流畅就可以了。有些人一提起练口语就是美剧英剧，其实工作时大部分时间聊的都是技术，而这方面的词汇和句式是很局限的，非常容易突击。如果老美聚在一起聊大学橄榄球，你默默走开就好了。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#333333"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin-top:0cm;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:7.5pt;margin-left:0cm;
background:white"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#333333">直接来美国工作还有一点比较特殊，就是工作签证。每年美国政府发给外国人的工作签证数量是有限的，前两年经济不好的时候，份额用不完，所以没有出现这个问题。而这两年</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#333333">IT</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
